pli-tv-bu-vb-sk43:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk43:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sakabaḷena mukhena byāharanti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk43:1.5: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca sakabaḷena mukhena byāharati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
